entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
